project_info: The CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) app allows users to manage records with essential details such as Name, City, and Age. Users can add new entries, update existing information, delete unnecessary records, and view all saved data in an organized manner. This app provides an efficient way to manage and maintain simple user information.
features: Add New Entries: Add new records with details like Name, City, and Age
Update Records: Edit or update existing records to keep information accurate
Delete Entries: Remove unnecessary or outdated records from the system
View Records: Display all added records in an organized manner for easy access

project_info: Movies Hub is a movie searching app allows users to easily search for movies by title and view detailed information, including the movie's synopsis, cast and release date. With an intuitive and user-friendly interface, the app provides a seamless experience for discovering and exploring movies.
features: Search Movies: Quickly find any movie by entering its title in the search bar
View Movie Details: Access detailed information about movies, including the title, synopsis, cast and release date
User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design for seamless navigation and a better user experience

project_info: Tic Tac Toe is a classic two-player strategy game where players take turns marking Xs and Os on a 3x3 grid. The objective is to align three symbols horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Simple yet engaging, it offers a fun and competitive experience for all ages.
A personal portfolio website built with React JS to showcase your skills, education, projects, contact, and personal info.
features: Home : Introduction & bio
About : Personal details, skills, education
Projects : Showcase work with GitHub/live demo links
Contact : Form & social links

project_info: Contact Book is a user-friendly application for managing contact information. Users can save contact details, including name, phone number, email, and profile photo. It allows seamless updating of contact details and deletion of unnecessary entries. With its intuitive design, Contact Book ensures efficient and organized contact management.
features: Save Contacts: Add new contacts with name, phone number, email, and a profile photo
Update Details: Edit contact information, including updating photos or correcting details
Delete Contacts: Remove unwanted or outdated contacts with ease
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for easy management of contact information

project_info: ESTORE is a modern ecommerce platform where users can create accounts, browse product catalogs with detailed images, add items to their cart, and search products with sorting and filtering options. Built with React JS, Redux, and Bootstrap, it offers a seamless and intuitive shopping experience.
features: Account Management: Create accounts with secure login and signup validations
Product Showcase: View detailed product descriptions with images
Cart Functionality: Add products to the cart for a seamless shopping experience
Search, Sort, and Filter: Easily search for products with sorting and filtering options

project_info: Students-website is a Static Website using Next JS and Tailwind CSS

Notebook is a secure, full-featured note-taking platform built with the MERN stack. It offers robust features for managing, securing, and organizing your notes, making it an ideal tool for both personal and professional use.
features: Secure User Authentication: Register and login with secure authentication to protect your notes
Note Management: Easily create, update, and delete notes
Export Options: Export your notes as PDF or TXT files for sharing or backup
Clipboard Copy: Copy notes directly to your clipboard with a single click
File Import: Import notes seamlessly from TXT files
Advanced Search & Sorting: Quickly find and organize notes with powerful search and sorting tools
Checklist Functionality: Create and manage tasks within your notes using checklists

project_info: Chatit is a real-time chat application built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) that allows users to seamlessly connect with friends, family, colleagues, and AI. This app supports live messaging and user authentication creating an engaging and interactive chat experience.
features: Real-time Chat: Instant messaging with friends, colleagues, and family
AI Integration: Chat with an AI for fun, assistance, or advice
User Authentication: Secure login and signup with user sessions
Customizable Profiles: Users can set up their profiles and update information
Responsive Design: Works smoothly on both mobile and desktop devices

project_info: ALIET is a feature-rich social media web application developed using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js). It enables users to connect with others, share content, and manage their profiles effortlessly.
features: Account Creation: Seamlessly create new user accounts with basic information and secure credentials
Profile Updates: Edit personal details, upload or update profile photos, and manage preferences
Password Management: Change the account password anytime for enhanced security
Account Deletion: Permanently delete accounts with confirmation prompts
Secure Access: Ensure secure login and logout with encrypted data handling and session management
Create Posts: Share updates with text, images
Delete Posts: Remove posts effortlessly when no longer needed
Bookmarks & Downloads: Bookmark posts for easy reference or download them to your device
Post Reactions: Like posts and view the total number of likes
Comments: Add comments to engage in meaningful discussions
User Search: Find other users easily by their name or username
Profile Viewing: Access detailed profiles of users, including their posts and engagement history
Follow System: Stay updated on activities by following or unfollowing other users
Real-Time Chat: Send and receive instant messages with other users
